paper_abstract: Some theorems concerning representation of fuzzy measure and the Choquet integral are shown independently by Murofushi and Sugeno (J. Math. Anal. Appl. 159, No2, (1991),532-549) and by Denneberg (Fuzzy sets and Systems, 92, (1997),139-156). Using the mediator for representations, it is shown that the theorems are partially equivalent. The difference between them are also stated with some examples.
paper_title: Representation of Choquet integral - Interpreter and Mobius transform
